jacdac.PotentiometerReg.Position:
Read-only ratio u0.16 (uint16_t). The relative position of the slider.
* ```
const [position] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u0.16")
```
jacdac.PotentiometerReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). Specifies the physical layout of the potentiometer.
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.PotentiometerVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
modules.PotentiometerClient.onPositionCh: Run code when the position changes by the given threshold value.
modules.PotentiometerClient.position: The relative position of the slider.
modules.PotentiometerClient.variant: Specifies the physical layout of the potentiometer.
